title: Klondike Gold Rush National Historical Park: Parks as Classrooms
body: Parks as Classrooms        Curriculum Materials Whether or not you're bringing students to Klondike Gold Rush, our lesson plans can help your class learn about this era of American history.  All Curriculum Materials     Field Trips Use Klondike Gold Rush National Historical Park as a window into the past for your students during a visit. Either arrange a ranger guide or find resources to plan your own trip to the park.  All Field Trips
